item.title: Tree cutting pruning 67/69 Witham Road, 5th January
item.description:
As per previous report 8218326 we were advised this tree would be cut before the end of the year. Please can you advise timescales as this is now nearly 4 years since the tree was last cut back. This is outside of the local authority three-year plan.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witham Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing household waste dumping by residents, 5th January
item.description:
The residents of 71A Plumstead Common Road (accessed from Bloomfield Road, upstairs rented accommodation) continue to dump their household waste on the footpath outside. This has been ongoing since autumn. They do not have bins (no garden to put them), and their landlord knows about it. The rubbish is mostly put into black bags and NOT the required official council bags for collection. This is wilful fly tipping and I want them done now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bloomfield Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncleared leaves, 5th January
item.description:
After having reported the masses of leaves and mud on the verge and curb, it was cleaned but as you can see, not very well. The job was not very well carried out. I have since moved the leaves to a pile in order that they can be collected and cleared away. As you can also see, the grass verge itself has not been cleared away in ages and has old branches that have fallen from the tree.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole / trench in road on junction, 5th January
item.description:
Previously reported and seemingly now closed without the problem being resolved - there is a very large pothole, about 60cm in length, on the junction of Anerley Station Road and Anerley Road. This has been getting increasingly large over recent months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: No MOT, been here all of 2025, 5th January
item.description:
I've reported this car as abandoned in October 2025 and the case is marked as closed - for no good reason. The car is still there and it currently has *NO MOT* (expired Sept 2025). it has a flat tyre, the bonnet is rusted, and is clearly unwanted. Please remove.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Margarets Grove, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Key boxes screwed into street tree, 5th January
item.description:
There has been a key box screwed into a street tree on Darville Road for over a month, now there is another one directly next to it, causing damage to the tree and impacting amenity value.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darville Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anderson bus idling, 5th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunray Avenue, Dulwich Village, Greater London
